column5: Well thanks to a couple of members helping me out I think I casn finally post some pics, I'd like to share from Simcoe this year.   My boys Trevor8 and Bradley 6 caught some really nice smallies, also a couple of pics of a recent taping of Extreme Angler TV.
Those are some nice smallies.Good to see you are still making time for the boys with the TV show and all.
Mark,thier almost the same size as you. The fish that is.  Nice fish bud,real nice fish.
nice fish and time well spent with your kids,wtg
